column4: my os has entered the busybox shell...says it gave up waiting for root device...how to resolve this?
boot to livecd and reinstall grub, you can also chroot to the installed system to troubleshoot
the apt session locks the packages so multiple parograms cannot access the same packages and cause possible issues
i realize that...but isn't there any program which handle all the installs the correct way, but allow multiple download sessions...?
